trait.name: Aggressive
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，兽人可以按其速度向它能看到的敌对生物移动。

trait.name: Reckless
entries: 在它的回合开始时，兽人可以在该回合内的所有近战武器攻击卷上获得优势，但对它的攻击卷有优势，直到它下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 兽人用其大斧或标枪进行两次攻击。

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺或范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，兽人可以按其速度向它能看到的敌对生物移动。

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: 果冻可以在1英寸宽的狭窄空间内移动而不被挤压。

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: 果冻可以爬上困难的表面，包括倒立在天花板上，而不需要进行能力检查。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 果冻进行了两次假肢攻击。

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害加上4 ({@damage 1d8})酸伤害。

reaction.name: Split
entries: 当一个中等或较大的果冻受到闪电或砍击伤害时，如果它至少有10点命中率，它将分裂成两个新的果冻。每个新的果冻的命中率等于原果冻的一半，向下取整。新的果冻比原来的果冻小一个尺寸。大的或小的果冻每回合只攻击一次，并且只造成其正常伤害的一半。

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: 渗出物可以在1英寸宽的狭窄空间中移动而不被挤压。

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: 在它5英尺范围内，接触到渗出物或用近战攻击击中它的生物会受到4({@damage 1d8})酸的伤害。
任何由金属或木头制成的非魔法武器，如果击中渗出物就会被腐蚀。在造成伤害后，该武器的伤害卷会受到一个永久性的累积惩罚。如果它的惩罚下降到-5，武器就会被摧毁。由金属或木头制成的非魔法弹药，如果击中淤泥，在造成伤害后会被摧毁。
渗出物可以在一回合内吃掉2英寸厚的非魔法木材或金属。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: 虽然渗出物保持不动，但它与油池或湿岩石没有区别。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 渗水者进行两次假肢攻击。

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})重击伤害加上7 ({@damage 2d6})酸液伤害，如果目标穿着非魔法金属盔甲，其盔甲会被部分腐蚀，并受到永久和累积的-1惩罚，以达到
它提供的AC。如果惩罚将其AC值降低至

trait.name: Ooze Cube
entries: 这个立方体占据了它的整个空间。其他生物可以进入这个空间，但是这样做的生物会受到立方体的吞噬作用，并且在救赎动作上有劣势。方块内的生物可以被看到，但有完全的掩护。在立方体5英尺范围内的生物可以采取行动，将一个生物或物体拉出立方体。这样做需要一个成功的{@dc 15}力量检查，并且尝试的生物会受到14({@damage 4d6})酸的伤害。这个立方体一次只能容纳一个巨大的、两个大型的、或最多四个中型或小型的生物。

trait.name: Transparent
entries: 即使立方体在众目睽睽之下，也需要通过成功的{@dc 15}智慧({@skill Perception})检查才能发现一个既未移动也未攻击的立方体。如果一个生物在不知情的情况下试图进入这个立方体的空间，会被这个立方体吓到。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 立方体进行了两次假肢攻击。

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})酸伤害。如果目标是大型或小型生物，则是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 14})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，在立方体的每个回合开始时受到14({@damage 4d6})酸液伤害，并且立方体不能使用这个假肢来攻击其他生物。

action.name: Engulf
entries: 方块的移动速度与它的速度相当。这样做时，它可以进入大型或小型生物的空间。每当立方体进入一个生物的空间时，该生物必须做一个{@dc 15}灵巧反射。
拯救成功后，该生物可以选择被推回5英尺或推到立方体的一侧。选择不被推的生物将承受拯救失败的后果。
在拯救失败的情况下，立方体进入生物的空间，生物会受到14({@damage 4d6})的酸性伤害并被吞噬。被吞噬的生物无法呼吸，在立方体的每个回合开始时都会受到28({@damage 8d6})酸液伤害。当立方体移动时，被吞噬的生物也会随之移动。
一个被吞噬的生物可以通过行动来尝试逃跑，做出一个{@dc 15}力量检查。如果成功，该生物就会逃脱，并进入一个它所选择的距离立方体5英尺以内的空间。

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: 布丁可以在1英寸宽的狭窄空间内移动而不被挤压。

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: 触摸布丁的生物或在它5英尺范围内用近战攻击击中它的生物会受到4（（%0%））的酸性伤害。任何由金属或木材制成的非魔法武器碰到布丁都会被腐蚀。在造成伤害后，该武器在伤害卷上会受到一个永久的累积惩罚。如果它的惩罚下降到-5，武器就会被摧毁。由金属或木材制成的非魔法弹药如果击中布丁，在造成伤害后会被摧毁。
布丁可以在一回合内吃透2英寸厚的非魔法木材或金属。

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: 布丁可以爬上困难的表面，包括倒立在天花板上，而不需要进行能力检查。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 布丁进行了两次假肢攻击。

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})重击伤害加上18 ({@damage 4d8})酸伤害。此外，目标所穿的非魔法盔甲会被部分溶解，并对其提供的AC进行永久和累积的-1惩罚。
如果惩罚将其AC值降低到10，则该盔甲被毁。

reaction.name: Split
entries: 当一个中等或更大的布丁受到闪电或砍击伤害时，如果它有至少10点命中率，它会分裂成两个新布丁。每个新布丁的命中率等于原布丁的一半，向下取整。新布丁比原布丁小一号。大的或小的布丁每回合只攻击一次，并且只造成其正常伤害的一半。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 鬼兽的先天法术能力是魅力（法术保存（%0%））。鬼兽可以天生施展以下法术，无需提供材料组件。

trait.name: Horrifc Appearance
entries: 任何在鬼兽30英尺范围内开始行动的人形生物，如果能看到鬼兽的真实形态，必须做一个{@dc 16}智慧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，该生物将在1分钟内受到（%1%）的影响。如果鬼兽在视线范围内，生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果鬼兽在视线范围内，则处于劣势，如果成功则结束对自身的影响。如果一个生物救赎成功或效果结束，该生物在接下来的24小时内对鬼神的恐怖外观免疫。
除非目标受到惊吓或突然发现鬼兽的真实形态，否则目标可以转移视线并避免做出最初的蓄力动作。在下一回合开始之前，转移视线的生物在对鬼兽的攻击卷中处于劣势。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 鬼谷子的武器攻击是有魔法的。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果鬼兽至少有1个命中点，它在回合开始时就会恢复10个命中点。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 鬼兽会进行两次爪子攻击。

action.name: Claw (Oni Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})毒药伤害。

action.name: Death Glare
entries: 鬼兽的目标是在她30英尺范围内她能看到的一个（%0%）生物。如果目标能看到鬼兽，它必须对这个魔法做一个{@dc 16}的智慧救赎动作，否则会下降到0点。

action.name: Change Shape
entries: 鬼怪会神奇地变身为一个小的或者是大的。
中型人形，变成大型巨人，或恢复其真实形态。
除了体型之外，它在每种形态下的统计数据都是一样的。如果鬼兽死亡，它就会恢复到它的真实形态。

action.name: Maddening Cackle {@recharge 5}
entries: 每个在鬼兽30英尺范围内并能听到鬼兽的生物，必须在一个{@dc 16}的魅力救赎上取得成功。如果救赎失败，目标会受到15({@damage 3d8 + 2})的精神伤害，并且必须使用其反应来移动到其速度的一半，并对鬼神所选择的一个鬼神能看到的生物进行近战武器攻击。建筑物和亡灵对该效果免疫。

reaction.name: Fade into Mist {@recharge 5}
entries: 当被攻击卷击中时，攻击反而会失误，鬼兽会变成气态，并移动到60英尺以外它能看到的无人的空间。在这种形态下，鬼兽可以进入另一个生物的空间，并对非魔法伤害有抵抗力，而且它在以下方面有优势
强度、灵巧和体质方面的救赎。目标可以穿过小洞、狭窄的开口，甚至是单纯的裂缝，尽管它把液体当作固体表面。目标不会坠落，即使在{@condition stunned}或其他情况下{@condition incapacitated}，仍会在空中盘旋。
当处于虚无缥缈的云层中时，目标不能说话或操纵物体，而且它所携带或持有的任何物体都不能被丢弃、使用或以其他方式进行互动。它一直保持这种形态，直到下一回合的开始。

entries: 鬼怪会神奇地变身为一个小的或者是大的。
中型人形，变成大型巨人，或恢复其真实形态。
除了尺寸之外，它的统计数据在每种形态下都是一样的。唯一被改造的装备是它的大剑，它可以缩小，从而可以在人形状态下挥舞它。如果鬼兽死了，它就会恢复到它的真实形态，它的大剑也会恢复到它的正常大小。

reaction.name: Fade into Mist {@recharge 5}
entries: 当被攻击卷击中时，攻击反而会失误，鬼兽会变成气态，并移动到60英尺以外它能看到的无人的空间。在这种形态下，鬼兽可以进入另一个生物的空间，并对非魔法伤害有抵抗力，而且它在以下方面有优势
强度、灵巧和体质方面的救赎。目标可以穿过小洞、狭窄的开口，甚至是单纯的裂缝，尽管它把液体当作固体表面。目标不会坠落，即使在{@condition stunned}或其他情况下{@condition incapacitated}，仍会在空中盘旋。
当处于虚无缥缈的云层中时，目标不能说话或操纵物体，而且它所携带或持有的任何物体都不能被丢弃、使用或以其他方式进行互动。它一直保持这种形态，直到下一回合的开始。

legendary.name: Attack
entries: 鬼兽会进行爪子或大剑攻击。

legendary.name: Command
entries: 鬼兽的目标是它在30英尺内能看到的一个盟友。如果目标能看到并听到鬼兽，目标可以作为反应进行一次武器攻击，并在攻击卷上获得优势。

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 鬼兽从它的先天或准备好的法术列表中施放一个法术，如常使用一个法术槽。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 鬼兽的先天法术能力是魅力（法术保存（%0%））。鬼兽可以天生施展以下法术，无需提供材料组件。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 鬼兽是一个14级的施法者。它的法术能力是智力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%）），它只需要语言成分来施法。它准备了以下的巫师法术。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 鬼谷子的武器攻击是有魔法的。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果鬼兽至少有1个命中点，它在回合开始时就会恢复10个命中点。

trait.name: Swift Caster {@recharge 5}
entries: 当鬼兽施展法术时，它可以选择将该法术的施展时间改为1个额外行动。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 鬼兽会进行两次攻击，要么用它的爪子，要么用它的尖刺链或尖刺链猛击。

action.name: Claw (Oni Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达20英尺，一个目标。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})砍击伤害，目标是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 18})。当生物处于{@condition grappled}这种状态时，鬼兽不能使用它的一个尖刺链攻击。

action.name: Spiked Chain Slam
entries: 鬼兽用它的尖刺链将一个大型或小型生物（%0%）撞向另一个生物或20英尺内的固体表面。两个生物都必须在一个{@dc 18}力量救赎上成功，否则会受到15({@damage 2d10 + 4})的重击伤害，并且{@condition stunned}直到下一回合结束。如果救赎成功，目标会受到一半的重击伤害，并且不会被（%4%）。

action.name: Change Shape
entries: 鬼怪会神奇地变身为一个小的或者是大的。
中型人形，变成大型巨人，或恢复其真实形态。
除了尺寸之外，它的统计数据在每种形态下都是一样的。唯一被改造的装备是它的青铜器，它的青铜器会缩小，从而可以在人形状态下挥舞。如果鬼兽死了，它就会恢复到它的真实形态，而它的琉璃刀也会恢复到它的正常大小。

当处于虚无缥缈的云层中时，目标不能说话或操纵物体，而且它所携带或持有的任何物体都不能被丢弃、使用或以其他方式进行互动。它一直保持这种形态，直到下一回合的开始。

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: 鬼兽通过恶梦萦绕吞噬它所杀害的受害者的灵魂。只有通过愿望咒语，或者杀死鬼兽，受害者的灵魂才能获得自由并愿意复活。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 鬼兽会进行两次攻击，要么用爪子，要么用晨星。

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Claw (Oni Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在{@dc 14}智慧救赎中成功，否则就会跌落{@condition unconscious}。该生物在1分钟内保持{@condition unconscious}，或直到它受到伤害，或有人使用动作摇晃或拍打该生物，使其清醒。

entries: 鬼怪会神奇地变身为一个小的或者是大的。
中型人形，变成大型巨人，或恢复其真实形态。
除了尺寸之外，它的统计数据在每种形态下都是一样的。唯一被改造的装备是它的青铜剑，它的青铜剑会缩小，从而可以在人形状态下挥舞它。如果鬼兽死亡，它就会恢复到它的真实形态，它的晨星也会恢复到它的正常大小。

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
entries: 当在虚空界时，鬼神会神奇地触碰物质界的一个沉睡的人形物体。对目标施展的善恶保护咒语会阻止这种接触，魔法阵也是如此。只要接触持续存在，目标就会出现可怕的幻觉。如果这些幻觉持续了至少1小时，目标不会从休息中获得任何好处，而且它的最大命中率会降低5（（%0%））。如果这个效果将目标的最大命中率降低到0，则目标死亡，而鬼兽获得{@dice 3d10}临时命中率。鬼兽的临时命中率会持续12小时。对目标最大命中率的降低会持续到被{@spell greater restoration}法术或类似魔法移除为止。

当处于虚无缥缈的云层中时，目标不能说话或操纵物体，而且它所携带或持有的任何物体都不能被丢弃、使用或以其他方式进行互动。它一直保持这种形态，直到下一回合的开始。

trait.name: Skullcrush
entries: 如果食人魔用近战攻击对一个生物取得关键一击，该生物会被（%0%），直到食人魔的下一个回合结束。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 食人魔进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})重击伤害。如果目标是大型或小型的，它必须成功地进行{@dc 14}力量投掷或被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺或范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 食人魔进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Great Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})重击伤害。

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺或范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Whirling Flail {@recharge 5}
entries: 食人魔战车的移动速度达到它的一半，在移动过程中，它的目标是10英尺内的每个生物。每个目标必须在一个{@dc 17}灵巧的蓄力动作中成功，否则会受到17({@damage 2d10 + 6})的打击伤害并被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage
entries: 如果食人魔在它的回合开始时已经从它的空间移动了至少15英尺，那么它在本回合的第一次攻击卷中就会获得优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 食人魔会进行两次近战或远程攻击。

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})重击伤害。

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺或范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: 当食人魔能看到的敌人在它的5英尺范围内结束其回合时，食人魔可以移动到其速度的一半。这种移动不会激起（%0%）。

headerEntries: 食人魔是一个6级的施法者。它的法术能力是智慧（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击击中（%1%））。它有以下德鲁伊法术的准备。

trait.name: Bark Orders
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，食人魔以它能看到的30英尺内的一个盟友为目标。如果目标能看到并听到食人魔，目标可以移动到其速度的一半，并作为反应进行一次武器攻击，但在攻击卷上有劣势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 食人魔会进行两次近战攻击。它可以用它的 "劈砍 "来代替它的一个带刺大棒的攻击。

action.name: Spiked Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})重击伤害加上4 ({@damage 1d8})穿刺伤害。如果目标是生物，并且对目标的攻击卷轴成功了5个或更多，目标必须成功进行{@dc 17}体质救赎，否则会被{@condition stunned}，直到下一回合结束。

action.name: Javelin

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 食人魔在其回合开始时恢复10点生命值。如果食人魔受到酸或火的伤害，这个特性在食人魔的下一个回合开始时不会发挥作用。食人魔只有在它的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时才会死亡。

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: 食人魔重掷一次失败的蓄力动作。它必须使用新的投掷。

trait.name: Wrathful Smite {@recharge 4}
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，当食人魔用近身攻击击中目标时，会造成额外的（%0%）坏死伤害，并且目标必须在（%1%）智慧救赎中成功，否则会变成（%2%），直到食人魔的下一个回合结束。

trait.name: Insanity Gaze
entries: 当一个生物在离nothic 30英尺范围内开始它的回合，并且能够看到nothic的眼睛时，nothic可以用魔法强迫它做一个{@dc 13}智力储蓄动作，除非nothic是{@condition incapacitated}。
在拯救失败的情况下，该生物必须使用它的行动来移动到它的速度，并对该生物选择的、该生物能看到的生物进行近战武器攻击。建筑物和亡灵对这个效果免疫。

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: Nothic在依靠视觉的智慧（（%0%））检查中具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nothic使用它的腐烂凝视并进行两次爪击。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})砍击伤害加上7 ({@damage 2d6})精神伤害。

action.name: Rotting Gaze
entries: Nothic的目标是它所看到的30英尺内的一个生物。目标必须对这个魔法做一个{@dc 13}体质测试，否则会受到14({@damage 4d6})坏死的伤害。

action.name: Mind Rot {@recharge 5}
entries: Nothic最多选择三个它能看到的60英尺内的生物。每个目标都必须在一个{@dc 14}智力测验中成功，否则会受到15({@damage 3d8 + 2})的精神伤害，在攻击卷、能力测验和蓄力测验中处于劣势，并且在nothic的下一回合结束前不能使用反应。如果目标是一个有未使用的法术槽的施法者，它也会消耗（%2%）法术槽（随机选择）。建筑物和亡灵对这个效果免疫。

action.name: Weird Insight
entries: Nothic的目标是它在30英尺范围内可以看到的一个生物。目标必须用它的魅力（（%0%））检查与nothic的智慧（（%1%））检查相抗衡。如果nothic赢了，它就会神奇地了解到关于目标的一个事实或秘密。如果目标对{@condition charmed}免疫，则自动获胜。

trait.name: Decaying Gaze
entries: 当一个生物在离nothic30英尺范围内开始它的回合，并且能够看到nothic的眼睛，nothic可以用魔法强迫它做一个{@dc 13}宪法规定的投掷，除非nothic是{@condition incapacitated}。
在拯救失败的情况下，该生物会受到21({@dice 6d6})的坏死伤害，并且它的最大命中率会减少，减少的量等于所受伤害。这种减少持续到该生物完成长时间休息。如果这个效果降低了它的最大命中率，目标就会死亡。

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: Nothic在依靠视觉的智慧（（%0%））检查中具有优势。

action.name: Decaying Glare
entries: Nothic的目标是它所看到的30英尺内的一个生物。目标必须对这个魔法进行{@dc 13}宪法救赎，否则就会受到21({@damage 6d6})的坏死伤害，并且它的最大命中率会减少，数量相当于所受伤害。这种减少会一直持续到该生物完成长时间的休息。
如果该效果使目标的最大命中率降至0，则目标死亡。

action.name: Mind Twitch {@recharge 5}
entries: nothic选择60英尺内它能看到的最多三个生物。每个目标必须在一个{@dc 14}智力测验中成功，否则会受到21({@damage 4d8 + 3})的精神伤害，并且必须使用他们的反应来移动到nothic所选择的、nothic可以看到的空间中，速度最多为其一半。这种移动会激起（%2%）。建筑物和亡灵对这个效果免疫。

action.name: Weird Insight
entries: Nothic的目标是它在30英尺范围内可以看到的一个生物。目标必须用它的魅力（（%0%））检查与nothic的智慧（（%1%））检查相抗衡。如果nothic赢了，它就会神奇地了解到关于目标的一个事实或秘密。如果目标对{@condition charmed}免疫，则自动获胜。

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: 敌视考查尔的生物如果在考查尔的20英尺范围内开始其回合，必须成功进行{@dc 14}智慧救赎，除非考查尔是{@condition incapacitated}。如果救赎失败，目标会受到（%2%）的影响，直到其下一个回合开始。
当{@condition frightened}以这种方式进行时，目标不能进行任何行动，除了移动到其速度的一半。如果一个生物的蓄力动作成功，该生物在接下来的24小时内对考什马的恐惧光环免疫。

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: 考什马可以为骑着它的人提供对火灾伤害的抵抗。

trait.name: Illumination
entries: 考什曼在半径15英尺的范围内发出亮光，在另外15英尺的范围内发出暗光。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 考什马会进行两次攻击：一次是咬人，一次是用蹄子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})火力伤害。

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6})重击伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})火焰伤害。

action.name: Ethereal Stride
entries: 考什玛和它周围5英尺范围内最多三个自愿的生物可以神奇地从物质界进入虚空界，或者反之亦然。

action.name: Sulfur Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 考什马在15英尺的锥形范围内吐出令人作呕的含硫烟雾。烟雾在角落里扩散，其区域被严重遮蔽。该区域内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 16}体质测试。如果救赎失败，该生物会受到14({@damage 4d6})的火焰伤害，并在每一个回合中花费行动力进行反胃和呕吐，持续1分钟。生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功，则结束对它的影响。不需要呼吸或对火免疫的生物在这个蓄力动作上自动成功。拯救成功后，该生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会受到任何其他影响。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 娜迦是一个15级的施法者。它的法术能力是智慧（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%）），它只需要语言成分来施法。它准备了以下的牧师法术。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 娜迦对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: 如果它死了，娜迦会在{@dice 1d6}天内恢复生命，并重新获得所有的命中率。只有愿望咒语才能阻止这一特性的发挥。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 娜迦会进行两次攻击：一次是咬人，一次是用尾巴。它可以用吐出的毒液代替咬人的攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，达到15英尺，一个目标。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})的穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 18}宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到54 ({@damage 12d8})的毒药伤害，成功时受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9}命中，到达20英尺/40英尺，一个目标。{@h}目标必须做一个{@dc 18}宪法救赎，如果救赎失败会受到54({@damage 12d8})的毒药伤害，如果救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})重击伤害。

legendary.name: Tail
entries: 娜迦做了一个尾巴攻击。

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 娜迦做了一次咬人的攻击。

legendary.name: Spit Poison (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 娜迦使用吐息毒药。

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 娜迦从它的先天法术列表中施放一个法术，像平常一样使用一个法术槽。

entries: 娜迦从它的先天法术列表中施放一个法术，像平常一样使用一个法术槽。

headerEntries: 娜迦是一个10级的施法者（法术保全（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%）），只需要语言成分就可以施法。
如果纳迦生前是守护纳迦，它的法术能力是智慧，并准备了以下牧师法术。
footerEntries: If the naga was a spirit naga in life , its spellcasting ability is Intelligence, and it has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 娜迦对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

entries: 娜迦有两种攻击方式：一种是咬人，一种是用尾巴。

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 娜迦从它的先天法术列表中施放一个法术，像平常一样使用一个法术槽。

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: 当霉菌受到伤害时，它周围240英尺内的所有其他霉菌都能感觉到它的痛苦。

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: 在阳光下时，菌类在能力检查、攻击卷和蓄力方面都处于劣势。如果在阳光直射下的时间超过1小时，菌类将死亡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 菌类使用它的治疗孢子或安抚孢子，然后做一个柄杖攻击。

action.name: Stipe Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d6})重击伤害加上7 ({@damage 2d6})毒药伤害。

action.name: Healing Spores (3/Day)
entries: 孢子的半径为10英尺，从菌类身上延伸出来。这些孢子可以绕过角落，只影响生物。受影响的生物会恢复7({@dice 2d6})点生命值。

action.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Day)
entries: 霉菌向它周围5英尺内能看到的一个生物喷射孢子。目标必须在宪法规定的投掷中成功，否则将在1分钟内受到{@condition stunned}的影响。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: 孢子的半径为20英尺，从菌类身上延伸出来。这些孢子可以绕过角落，并且只影响智力为2或更高的生物，而不是亡灵、构筑物或元素。受影响的生物在彼此30英尺范围内可以用心灵感应进行交流。该效果持续1小时。

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifce
entries: 当一个在5英尺范围内的生物被攻击击中时，菌类会与该生物交换位置并被击中。

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: 当霉菌受到伤害时，它周围240英尺内的所有其他霉菌都能感觉到它的痛苦。

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: 在阳光下时，菌类在能力检查、攻击卷和蓄力方面都处于劣势。如果在阳光直射下的时间超过1小时，菌类将死亡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 菌类会进行两次拳头攻击。它可以用安抚性孢子代替其中一次拳头攻击。

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 2d4})重击伤害加上5 ({@damage 2d4})毒伤害。

action.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Day)
entries: 霉菌向它周围5英尺内能看到的一个生物喷射孢子。目标必须在宪法规定的投掷中成功，否则将在1分钟内受到{@condition stunned}的影响。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。

monster.name: Royal Sorcerer Mummy
languages: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 木乃伊是一个10级的施法者。它的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击击中（%1%））。它准备了以下的巫师法术。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 木乃伊在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击上有优势。

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: 木乃伊有10点巫术点数。它可以花费1个或更多的巫术点数作为奖励动作，以获得以下好处之一。
强化法术。当木乃伊施展的法术迫使生物进行蓄力以抵抗法术的效果时，它可以花费3个巫术点数，让法术的一个目标在第一次蓄力对抗法术时处于不利地位。
加速施法。当木乃伊施展一个施法时间为1个行动的法术时，木乃伊可以花费2个巫术点数将这次施法的时间改为1个额外行动。
微妙的法术。当木乃伊施展法术时，它可以花费1个巫术点来施展该法术，而不需要任何身体或语言的成分。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 木乃伊可以使用它可怕的目光，并用它的腐烂的拳头进行一次攻击。

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})重击伤害加上14 ({@damage 4d6})腐烂伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须成功地进行{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则会被诅咒为木乃伊腐烂。被诅咒的目标不能恢复命中率，而且每过24小时，其最大命中率会减少10（（%6%））。如果诅咒将目标的最大命中率降低到0，目标就会死亡，其身体会变成灰尘。诅咒持续到被{@spell remove curse}法术或其他魔法移除为止。

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: 木乃伊的目标是60英尺内它能看到的一个生物。如果目标能看到木乃伊，它必须对这个魔法进行{@dc 16}的智慧救赎，否则会变成{@condition frightened}，直到木乃伊的下一个回合结束。如果目标的蓄力失败5次或更多，它也会在相同的时间内变成（%2%）。救赎成功的目标在接下来的24小时内对所有木乃伊（但不是木乃伊领主）的可怕目光免疫。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 木乃伊可以使用它可怕的目光，并用它的腐烂的拳头进行一次攻击。

entries: 木乃伊的目标是60英尺内它能看到的一个生物。如果目标能看到木乃伊，它必须对这个魔法进行{@dc 12}的智慧救赎，否则会变成{@condition frightened}，直到木乃伊的下一个回合结束。如果目标的蓄力失败5次或更多，它也会在相同的时间内变成（%2%）。救赎成功的目标在接下来的24小时内对所有木乃伊（但不是木乃伊领主）的可怕目光免疫。

entries: 如果牛头人向一个目标移动了至少10英尺，然后在同一回合内用血肉攻击击中该目标，该目标会受到额外的9（（%0%））穿刺伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在一个{@dc 14}的力量救赎中成功，或者被推到10英尺以外并被击倒{@condition prone}。

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})砍击伤害。

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Charge
entries: 如果牛头人向一个目标移动了至少10英尺，然后在同一回合内用血肉攻击击中该目标，该目标会受到额外的9（（%0%））穿刺伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在一个{@dc 16}的力量救赎中成功，或者被推到10英尺以外并被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: 牛头人可以完美地回忆起它走过的任何道路。

trait.name: Reckless
entries: 在它的回合开始时，牛头人可以在该回合内的所有近战武器攻击卷上获得优势，但对它的攻击卷有优势，直到它下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 牛头人进行两次攻击：一次用大斧，一次用血肉。它可以使用 "劈砍 "来代替一次攻击。

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5})砍击伤害。

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Cleaving Swing {@recharge 5}
entries: 牛头人挥动它的大斧，在它周围5英尺范围内的每一个生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}灵巧的蓄力动作上取得成功。蓄力失败时，生物会受到18({@damage 2d12 + 5})的砍击伤害，成功时则是一半的伤害。

reaction.name: Death Strike
entries: 作为对被攻击降低到0命中率的回应，并且该攻击不是关键一击，牛头人可以移动到其速度的一半，并在死亡或倒下之前以优势进行一次近战攻击（%0%）。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: 弑心者与生俱来的法术能力是智力（法术保存（%0%））。弑心者可以天生施展以下法术，而无需提供材料组件。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 噬心者是一个15级的施法者。它的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击击中（%1%））。当它完成短时或长时的休息时，它可以重新获得其消耗的法术槽。它知道以下的术士法术。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 噬心者在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

trait.name: Whispering Aura
entries: 在弑心者的每个回合开始时，它周围5英尺内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 16}智慧救赎，否则会受到14({@damage 4d6})的精神伤害，前提是弑心者不是{@condition incapacitated}。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})精神伤害。如果目标是中等或较小的，它将被{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 15})，并且必须在{@dc 15}智力救赎上成功，否则将被{@condition stunned}，直到此抓捕结束。

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 8}击中，达到5英尺，一个{@condition incapacitated}人形{@condition grappled}被心灵杀手。{@h}55({@damage 10d10})穿刺伤害。如果目标是大型或较小的生物，则为{@condition grappled}（逃逸{@dc 15}）。如果这个伤害将目标降低到0命中率，那么弑心者会通过提取和吞噬其大脑来杀死目标。

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: 弑心者在60英尺的范围内神奇地释放出精神能量。该区域内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}智力测验中成功，否则会受到22({@damage 4d8 + 4})的精神伤害并在1分钟内受到{@condition stunned}。生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: 弑心者与生俱来的法术能力是智力（法术保存（%0%））。弑心者可以天生施展以下法术，而无需提供材料组件。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 噬心者是一个10级的施法者。它的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。它有以下巫师法术准备。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 噬心者在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: 噬心者有10个巫术点。它可以花费1个或更多的巫术点数作为奖励动作，以获得以下好处之一。
强化法术。当弑心者施展法术，迫使一个生物进行蓄力以抵抗法术的效果时，它可以花费3个巫术点数，让法术的一个目标在其第一次蓄力对抗法术时处于不利地位。
快速施法。当弑心者施展一个施法时间为1个行动的法术时，弑心者可以花费2个巫术点数将这次施法的时间改为1个额外的行动。
微妙的法术。当弑心者施展法术时，它可以花费1个巫术点来施展没有任何体质或语言成分的法术。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})精神伤害。如果目标是中等或较小的，它将被{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 15})，并且必须在{@dc 15}智力救赎上成功，否则将被{@condition stunned}，直到此抓捕结束。

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 8}击中，达到5英尺，一个{@condition incapacitated}人形{@condition grappled}被心灵杀手。{@h}55({@damage 10d10})穿刺伤害。如果目标是大型或较小的生物，则为{@condition grappled}（逃逸{@dc 15}）。如果这个伤害将目标降低到0命中率，那么弑心者会通过提取和吞噬其大脑来杀死目标。

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: 弑心者在60英尺的范围内神奇地释放出精神能量。该区域内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}智力测验中成功，否则会受到22({@damage 4d8 + 4})的精神伤害并在1分钟内受到{@condition stunned}。生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: 弑心者与生俱来的法术能力是智力（法术保存（%0%））。弑心者可以天生施展以下法术，而无需提供材料组件。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 噬心者在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: 在它的第一个回合中，弑心者在对任何还没有回合的生物的攻击卷轴上有优势。弑心者对惊讶的生物的任何一击都是关键一击。

trait.name: Soul Knives
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，弑心者可以创造出闪烁的能量刀，从它的双拳中投射出来。在展示这些刀时，它不能用手拿任何东西。它可以将它们作为一个额外的动作来解散。

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: 当弑心者用武器攻击击中目标并在攻击卷上有优势时，或者当目标在弑心者的盟友5英尺范围内，而弑心者在攻击卷上没有劣势时，会造成额外的10（（%0%））伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 噬心者进行三次攻击：一次用触手，两次用灵魂之刀。

action.name: Soul Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})精神伤害，并且目标不能采取反应，直到弑心者的下一回合结束。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})精神伤害。如果目标是中等或较小的，它将被{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 15})，并且必须在{@dc 15}智力救赎上成功，否则将被{@condition stunned}，直到此抓捕结束。

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 7}击中，达到5英尺，一个{@condition incapacitated}人形{@condition grappled}被心灵杀手。{@h}55({@damage 10d10})穿刺伤害。如果目标是大型或较小的生物，则为{@condition grappled}（逃逸{@dc 15}）。如果这个伤害将目标降低到0命中率，那么弑心者会通过提取和吞噬其大脑来杀死目标。

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: 弑心者在60英尺的范围内神奇地释放出精神能量。该区域内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}智力测验中成功，否则会受到22({@damage 4d8 + 4})的精神伤害并在1分钟内受到{@condition stunned}。生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: 模仿者可以使用它的行动来多态化为一个物体或回到它真正的、无定形的形式。它的统计数据在每种形态下都是一样的。它所穿戴或携带的任何装备都不会被转化。如果它死了，它将恢复到它的真实形态。

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: 拟态会附着在任何接触它的东西上。粘附在拟态体上的生物也会被它{@condition grappled}（逃脱{@dc 17}）。为逃脱此抓捕而进行的能力检查有不利的影响。

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: 模仿者在对它所惊动的任何生物进行攻击时具有优势。

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: 当模仿者保持不动，它与普通物体没有区别。

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mimic makes four attacks: two with its pseudopods and one with its bite or acid spit.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) acid damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the mimic can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The mimic makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mimic, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the mimic's turns. A mimic can have only up to one Medium or two Small creatures swallowed at a time.

If the mimic takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the mimic must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the mimic. If the mimic dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: 模仿者可以使用它的行动来多态化为一个物体或回到它真正的、无定形的形式。它的统计数据在每种形态下都是一样的。它所穿戴或携带的任何装备都不会被转化。如果它死了，它将恢复到它的真实形态。

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 15}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: 模仿者在对它所惊动的任何生物进行攻击时具有优势。

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: 当模仿者保持不动，它与普通物体没有区别。

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mimic makes three attacks: two with its pseudopods and one with its bite or acid spit.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The merrow is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merrow can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merrow makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or harpoon.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The merrow magically polymorphs into a hunter shark, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merrow can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The merrow rerolls a failed saving throw. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the merrow can regain 15 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merrow makes three attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or harpoon, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The merfolk is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The merfolk magically polymorphs into a giant sea horse or giant octopus, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The merfolk can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The merfolk deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the merfolk that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the merfolk doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺或范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The merfolk is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Divine Boon
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the merfolk and is visible to the merfolk hits with a melee attack, the merfolk can expend a spell slot to cause the target's melee attack to magically deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. If the merfolk expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The medusa is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Blood of the Serpents
entries: A creature that hits the medusa with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage and is within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage. Additionally, a swarm of snakes (MM p.338) appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the medusa, and acts as an ally of the medusa.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the medusa's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the medusa, the medusa can force it to make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw if the medusa isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrifed. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrifed on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrifcation lasts until the creature is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the medusa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the medusa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the medusa sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of it and in an area of bright light, the medusa is, due to its curse, affected by its own gaze.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The medusa has 12 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Heightened Spell: When the medusa casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the medusa can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the medusa casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the medusa can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.
Subtle Spell: When the medusa casts a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to cast the spell without any somatic or verbal components.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the medusa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The medusa makes either three melee attacks - one with its snake hair, one with its scimitar, and one to constrict - or three ranged attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the medusa can't constrict another target.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The medusa makes a scimitar or longbow attack or uses Constrict.

legendary.name: Force Petrifying Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The medusa forces a creature {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} by it to meet its gaze. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become petrifed (see Petrifying Gaze).

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The medusa casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Stealthy
entries: On each of its turns, the displacer beast stalker can use a bonus action to take the {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
entries: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Slay Foe (1/Turn)
entries: The manticore deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage with its weapon attack if it hits a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or three with its tail spikes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) percing damage.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Commanding Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the manticore emits a terrifying howl that also rallies its allies. Each ally that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Commanding Roar gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throw rolls until the start of the manticore's next turn. All other creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the manticore Savage
Howl for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

entries: The lizardfolk has 6 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Empowered Spell: When the lizardfolk rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the lizardfolk casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lich is a 20th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The lich's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the lich targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the lich dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the lich gains the following benefits:

items: It deals an extra 6 damage on damage rolls against the cursed target.
它对被诅咒的目标所做的任何攻击卷都是在19或20的卷轴上的关键命中（%0%）。
If the cursed target dies, the hex knight regains 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lich makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its paralyzing touch.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage and 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute.
The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reaction.name: Armor of Hexes
entries: When hit by an attack roll by a creature cursed by the lich's Hexblade's Curse, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 4 or higher, the attack instead misses the lich, regardless of its roll.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The lich casts a cantrip.

entries: The lich makes a longsword attack.

entries: The lich uses its Paralyzing

entries: The lich fxes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Dark Hunger (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each living creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one and the lich regains hit points equal to the total damage inflicted.

monster.name: Banelich

languages: Common plus up to two other languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lich is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lich makes two coldfire attacks.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute.
The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Coldfire
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Grasp of Death (1/Day)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or its hit points drop to 0. On a success, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Painwrack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich fxes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The {@condition stunned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

entries: Each living creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lamia's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The lamia can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lamia is an 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Enthralling Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the lamia's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the lamia, the lamia can force it to make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw if the lamia isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the lamia.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the lamia until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the lamia in the meantime, it must immediately make the saving throw.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The lamia has 13 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Heightened Spell: When the lamia casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the lamia can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the lamia casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the lamia can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.
Subtle Spell: When the lamia casts a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to cast the spell without any somatic or verbal components.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The lamia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lamia makes two attacks: one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch and one with Constrict.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the lamia can't constrict another target.

action.name: Intoxicating Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and all ability checks.

entries: The lamia makes a dagger attack or uses Constrict.

entries: The lamia uses its Intoxicating Touch.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuotoa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the kuo-toa is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifer.

trait.name: Thunder Strike (5/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when the kuo-toa hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the creature's next turn, or half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned} on a successful one.

trait.name: Water Whip (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the kuo-toa targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage, and the kuotoa can choose to either knock it {@condition prone} or pull it up to 25 feet closer to it. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and doesn't get pulled or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kraken uses Lightning

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specifc Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warhound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Dark Whispers
entries: The jackalwere can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the jackalwere, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the jackalwere by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash

action.name: line of sight to the jackalwere, the creature can repeat the saving
entries: throw. On a success, the effect ends.

action.name: Psychic Blades (3/day)
entries: The jackalwere deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack.

action.name: Bite ( Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours.
Undead and creatures immune to being {@condition charmed} aren't affected by it.

reaction.name: Vexing Howl {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the jackalwere, is visible to the jackalwere, and can hear the jackalwere makes an attack roll but before the outcome is determined, the jackalwere can impose disadvantage to the creature's attack roll. If the attack misses, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the hydra takes 30 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken cold damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 12 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads, each of which it can replace with one use of Fire Breath.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) percing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (1/Turn)
entries: One of the hydra's heads exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the gulguthydra must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the gulguthydra's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads, and two tentacle attacks. It can replace both tentacle attacks with tentacle slam.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) percing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure . The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage.

If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The gulguthydra has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The gulguthydra slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the gulguthydra's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two morningstar attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The hobgoblin grants a + 10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The hobgoblin can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害，如果双手使用，则为8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Direct Counterstrike
entries: In response to a creature missing the hobgoblin with a melee attack and the attacker is visible to the hobgoblin, it can target an ally within 5 feet of the creature. If the ally can see and hear the hobgoblin, it uses its reaction to make one melee weapon attack against the creature with advantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Arcane Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The hobgoblin has 6 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Empowered Spell: When the hobgoblin rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Acid Breath (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin exhales acid in an 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fire Breath (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The hobgoblin can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature hostile to the hobgoblin that starts its turn within 20 feet of the hobgoblin must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, unless the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the target can't perform any actions except move up to half its speed. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the hobgoblin's Aura of Dread for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the hobgoblin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal an extra {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. The creature is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened}.
If the hobgoblin expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum 5d8).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two morningstar attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use Command Ally in place of one weapon attack.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Command Ally
entries: The hobgoblin targets an ally within 30 feet that can see and hear the hobgoblin. The target uses its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack.

action.name: Dreadmaster's Presence (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the hobgoblin, can see the hobgoblin, and not already affected by Dreadmaster's Presence gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn. Each creature of the hobgoblin's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can see it, and not already affected by Dreadmaster's Presence become {@condition frightened} until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn.

monster.name: Battle Horror

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The battle horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The battle horror's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The battle horror is immune to six spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include {@spell fireball}, {@spell heat metal}, and {@spell lightning bolt}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The battle horror makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The battle horror adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the battle horror must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the battle horror makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the battle horror can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the battle horror. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target can take the {@action Dash} action on its turn to move toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit , and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns . If a creature's saving throw is successful , the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Vexing Screech {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the harpy, is visible to the harpy, and can hear the harpy makes an attack roll but before the outcome is determined, the harpy can impose disadvantage to the creature's attack roll. If the attack misses, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Horrifc Appearance
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the hag is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrifc Appearance for the next 24 hours.

Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the hag's true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the hag.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The hag has 12 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Heightened Spell: When the hag casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the hag can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the hag casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the hag can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours.

action.name: Death Glare
entries: The hag targets one {@condition frightened} creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the hag, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 hit points.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illu sion that makes her look like an ugly creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The effect ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have no claws, but someone touching her hand might feel the claws. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 21} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

reaction.name: Confounding Cackle {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature targets the hag or the hag's ally with an attack, and the creature is within 30 feet, visible to and can hear the hag, the hag can force the creature to make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the hag chooses another creature within reach or range of the attacker's attack and the chosen creature becomes the target instead. If there are no other creatures within range, the hag imposes disadvantage on the attacker's attack roll instead.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the hag makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a {@dice d10} to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious}. The creature remains {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, or until it takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the creature awake.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a {@item heartstone|mm} in her possession.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
entries: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A {@spell protection from evil and good} spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a {@spell magic circle}. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no beneft from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Stupefying Cackle {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the hag and able to hear the hag must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 23 ({@dice 4d8 + 5}) psychic damage, and falls {@condition unconscious}. The creature remains {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, or until it takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the creature awake. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition unconscious}. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into any beast of CR 4 or less, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the gorgon enters must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the gorgon's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the gorgon remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the gorgon. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 23} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the gorgon and is no longer {@condition restrained}

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

monster.name: Iron Golem Juggernaut

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The golem deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crushing Stride
entries: The golem moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the golem enters must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the golem's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If the golem remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the golem.

While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 23} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the golem and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge}
entries: The golem exhales poison gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Stone Golem Sentinel

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
