entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the uchuulun must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed} and takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The uchuulun magically emits psychic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 29 ({@damage 6d8 + 2}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Chuul Juggernaut
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The chuul can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chuul makes two pincer attacks and uses its telekinetic pull. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) if it is a Huge or smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the chuul must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed} and takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Telekinetic Pull
entries: The chuul projects a powerful telekinetic force that grips and crushes a target within 120 feet. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or it takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage and the chuul pulls the target up to 30 feet towards itself. It is {@condition restrained} by the chuul's telekinetic grip until the start of the chuul's next turn or until the chuul is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
entries: The mantimera has twenty-four tail spikes.
Used spikes regrow when the manti core finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The mantimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mantimera makes four attacks: one with its manticore head's bite, one with its dragon head's bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws, or four with its tail spikes. When its acid breath is available, it can use the acid breath in place of its dragon head's bite.

action.name: Dragon Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) percing damage plus 4 ({@dice 1d8}) acid.

action.name: Manticore Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) percing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge}
entries: The dragon head exhales acid in an 30- foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The gorgimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the gorgimera moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gorgimera makes four attacks: one with its lion head's bite, one with its dragon head's bite, one with its gore, and one with its claws. When its lightning breath is available, it can use the lightning breath in place of its dragon head's bite. When its petrifcation breath is available, it can use the petrifcation breath in place of its gore. However, it can't use both lightning and petrifcation breaths on the same turn.

action.name: Dragon Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) percing damage plus 5 ({@dice 1d10}) lightning.

action.name: Lion Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})砍击伤害。

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge}
entries: The dragon head exhales lightning in an 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Petrifcation Breath {@recharge}
entries: The gorgon head exhales petrifying gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The ankhimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankhimera makes three attacks: one with its ankheg head's bite, one with its dragon head's bite, and one with its horns. When its acid spray is available, it can use the acid spray in place of its ankheg head's bite. When its cold breath is available, it can use the cold breath in place of its dragon head's bite. However, it can't use both acid spray and cold breath on the same turn.

action.name: Ankheg Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) percing damage plus 3 ({@dice 1d6}) acid. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).
Until this grapple ends, the ankheg head can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Dragon Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) percing damage plus 4 ({@dice 1d8}) cold.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg head spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge}
entries: The dragon head exhales cold in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The chimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes four attacks: one with its lion head's bite, one with its dragon head's bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its dragons head's bite.

action.name: Dragon Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) percing damage plus 4 ({@dice 1d8}) fire.

action.name: Lion Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) percing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The chimera makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The chimera moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The chimera makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Lion's Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The chimera's lion head emits a magical roar. Each creature within 120 feet that can hear its roar must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be and {@condition frightened} for one minute. If a creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} for the same duration. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Lion's Roar the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The centaur is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its sickle and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a halberd attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 17 ({@damage 5d6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The centaur rerolls a failed saving throw. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the centaur can regain 15 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes three attacks: two with its halberd and one with its hooves or three with its longbow.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slashing Gallop {@recharge 5}
entries: The centaur moves up to its speed in a straight line and targets each creature within 10 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The centaur can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage
entries: The centaur gains advantage on its first attack roll this turn if it has moved at least 15 feet from its space at the beginning of its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: When an enemy the centaur can see ends its turn within 5 feet of it, the centaur can move up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The carrion crawler has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The carrion crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The carrion crawler makes four attacks: three with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) percing damage.

action.name: Tentacle Flurry {@recharge 5}
entries: The carrion crawler makes eight attacks with its tentacles.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cambion's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). The cambion can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cambion is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Distracting Hand
entries: As a bonus action, while the cambion has the
Mage Hand spell active, it can designate a creature within 5 feet of the spectral hand. The cambion has advantage on its attack rolls against that creature until the end of the turn.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the cambion is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the cambion instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The cambion deals an extra 24 ({@dice 7d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the cambion that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the cambion doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

If the cambion expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

The {@condition charmed} target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The cambion exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the cambion must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If a {@condition frightened} target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Burst Forth (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bulette breaks through solid ground or wall as a bonus action, showering the area with debris. Each creature within 15 feet of the bulette that is surprised must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength check, taking 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the bulette takes 29 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bulette makes three melee attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}38 ({@damage 5d12 + 6}) percing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the bulette can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 19 ({@dice 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the bulette's space.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The bulette makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bulette, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the bulette's turns. A bulette can have only up to one Medium or two Small creatures swallowed at a time.

If the bulette takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the bulette must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the bulette. If the bulette dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage and the target gains disadvantage on its next attack roll until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage in melee or 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage at range.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the tree blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal dead or leafless tree.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tree blight makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). The tree blight has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the ancient blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal dead or leafless ancient tree.

trait.name: Grasping Roots
entries: The ancient blight can have up to six root tendrils at a time. Each root tendril can be attacked (AC 15; 10 hit points).

Destroying a root tendril deals no damage to the ancient blight, but reduces its number of root tendrils. A root tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 17} Strength check against it. A lost root tendril regrows after 24 hours.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The ancient blight deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ancient blight makes six attacks: four with its root tendrils and two with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Root Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ancient blight can't use the same root tendril on another target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The ultimate tyrant's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}). As long as the ultimate tyrant's antimagic cone is inactive, the ultimate tyrant can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The ultimate tyrant's central eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the anti magic feld spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the ultimate tyrant decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active. The area works against the ultimate tyrant's own eye rays.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Command Beholders
entries: The ultimate tyrant targets up to 4 beholders within 60 feet that can see and hear the ultimate tyrant. The target uses its reaction to make one bite or eye ray attack.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The ultimate tyrant shoots four of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to four targets it can see within 120 feet of it:
Charm Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20}Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the ultimate tyrant for 1 hour, or until the ultimate tyrant harms the creature.

Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Slowing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or the ultimate tyrant moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the ultimate tyrant's next turn or until the ultimate tyrant is {@condition incapacitated}. If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The ultimate tyrant can also exert fne control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

Sleep Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep and remain {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

Petrifcation Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fne gray dust. If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is di sintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.
Death Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

reaction.name: Redirect Antimagic Cone
entries: When the ultimate tyrant sees a creature within 150 feet cast a spell, the ultimate tyrant activates its antimagic cone and points it at the creature.

legendary.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The ultimate tyrant turns which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

legendary.name: Command Beholders
entries: The ultimate tyrant targets up to 2 beholders within 60 feet that can see and hear the ultimate tyrant. The target uses its reaction to make one bite or eye ray attack.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The ultimate tyrant uses one random eye ray.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ultimate tyrant casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Eye Frenzy (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The ultimate tyrant uses three random eye rays.

trait.name: Cold Vulnerability Cone
entries: The beholder's central eye creates an area of vulnerability to cold, in a 120-foot cone. While inside the area of effect, a creature that is not immune to cold gains vulnerable to cold. If a creature takes cold damage while inside the area of effect, it's speed is halved, it can't take reactions, and it can take either an

action.name: the end of the creature's next turn
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The beholder shoots two of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to two targets it can see within 120 feet of it:
Frost Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Freeze Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute, or half as much damage and is not {@condition restrained} on a successful one. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage at the start of each of the beholder's turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or the beholder moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder is {@condition incapacitated}. If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The beholder can also exert fne control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

reaction.name: Ice Armor
entries: The beholder adds 4 to its AC against one weapon or spell attack that would hit it. To do so, the beholder must see the attacker.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

trait.name: Fire Vulnerability Cone
entries: The beholder's central eye creates an area of vulnerability to fire, in a 120-foot cone, even when the beholder uses its Optic Fire Blast. While inside the area of effect, a creature that is not immune to fire gains vulnerable to fire.
At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The beholder shoots two of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to two targets it can see within 120 feet of it:
Fire Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or the beholder moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder is {@condition incapacitated}. If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The beholder can also exert fne control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

action.name: Optic Fire Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The beholder's central eye projects fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The beholder uses one random eye ray

Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Slowing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not bof. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Telekinetic Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or the beholder moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder is {@condition incapacitated}. If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The beholder can also exert fne control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

Sleep Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep and remain {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

On a failure, the creature is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fne gray dust. If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.
Death Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

reaction.name: Redirect Antimagic Cone
entries: When the beholder sees a creature within 150 feet cast a spell, the beholder activates its antimagic cone and points it at the creature.

legendary.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The beholder turns which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active.

legendary.name: Eye Ray
entries: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The beholder casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) percing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 9d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the behir fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes three attacks: one with its bite, one to constrict, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) percing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Huge or smaller creature. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 40 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 82 ({@damage 15d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The behir makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only up to one Large or two Medium creatures swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The behir makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The behir moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The behir makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The behir makes a bite attack.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw if the basilisk isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert it s eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The basilisk makes three melee attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) percing damage plus 10 ({@dice 3d6}) poison.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The basilisk exhales poison in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The banshee is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The banshee can use its Dreadful Visage and then use Life Drain. It can use Kiss of Death in place of Life Drain.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk ms} + {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Dreadful Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the initial saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} in this way. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Dreadful Visage for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Kiss of Death
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition incapacitated} male humanoid creature. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw. On failed save, the target's hit points is reduced to 0. On a success, the creature takes 25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) necrotic damage and its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Wail (2/day)
entries: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 60 feet of her that can hear her must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The banshee up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Life Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The banshee uses its Life Drain.

legendary.name: Kiss of Death (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The banshee uses its Kiss of Death.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The banshee casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Keening (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The banshee uses its Wail.

trait.name: Extra Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Divine Fury (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the azer can magically infuse its attacks with divine energy. For 1 minute, the first creature the azer hits on each of its turns with a weapon attack takes 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Zealous Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the azer unleashes a battle cry infused with divine energy. Up to ten other creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it that can hear it gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Aura of Tyranny
entries: An ally that is within 30 feet of the azer and can see and hear the azer and has less hit points than the azer has advantage to saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Extra Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Spur Ally
entries: As a bonus action, the azer targets an allied creature within 30 feet that can see and hear the azer and must have less hit points than the azer. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage and uses its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The azer is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Extra Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Fiery Retribution (3/day)
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the azer hits the azer with an attack, and the azer can see the creature, the azer can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage plus 2 ({@dice 1d4}) acid.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The broodling spits acid in a line that is 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Lay Egg
entries: As a bonus action, the brood queen can lay an egg that contains an ankheg broodling. The egg appears in the nearest space within 5 feet of the brood queen. The egg has an of AC 5 and has 5 hit points. At the end of the brood queen's next turn, the ankheg broodling can use a bonus action to break out of its egg and immediately move and attack the nearest creature that isn't an ankheg.

trait.name: Burst Forth (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The brood queen breaks through solid ground or wall as a bonus action, showering the area with debris. Each creature within 15 feet of the brood queen that is surprised must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength check, taking 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brood queen makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) acid. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the brood queen can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})砍击伤害。

action.name: Command Ankhegs
entries: The brood queen targets {@dice 1d4} ankhegs within 30 feet that can see and hear the brood queen. The target uses its reaction to make one melee attack.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The brood queen spits acid in a line that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The statue is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic feld. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the statue must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The statue is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic feld. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the statue must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The statue is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic feld. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the statue must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The solar's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}). The solar can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Fiendish Weapons
entries: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 6d8} necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the solar can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the solar can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The solar makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Slaying Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 120/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or die.

action.name: Flying Sword
entries: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 feet and either make one attack against a target or return to the solar's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if the solar dies .

action.name: Life Drain (4/day)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}40 ({@damage 8d8 + 4}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Necrotic Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The solar emits magical abyssal energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Dreadful Glare (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be {@condition frightened}. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the solar's gaze for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The planetar's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The planetar can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Fiendish Weapons
entries: The planetar's weapon attacks are magical. When the planetar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 5d8} necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the planetar can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the planetar can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The planetar makes two greatsword attacks. It can use Life Drain in place of one greatsword attack.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Life Drain (4/day)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d8 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deva's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The deva can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Fiendish Weapons
entries: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the deva can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the deva can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deva makes two mace attacks. It can use Life Drain in place of one mace attack.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Life Drain (3/day)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form . It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice). In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

trait.name: Abolethic Vassal
entries: The skum is permanently {@condition charmed} by its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The skum can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Psychic Conditioning
entries: The skum is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and {@condition charmed} conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: The skum takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skum makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6})砍击伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Mind-Bending Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: The skum can emit a psychic scream. Each creature within 30 feet that is not an aboleth or a skum and can hear its scream takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the end of the skum's next turn.

trait.name: Abolethic Vassal
entries: The skum is permanently {@condition charmed} by its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The skum can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Psychic Conditioning
entries: The skum is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and {@condition charmed} conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: The skum takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skum makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Mind-Bending Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: The skum can emit a psychic scream. Each creature within 30 feet that is not an aboleth or a skum and can hear its scream takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the end of the skum's next turn.

trait.name: Abolethic Vassal
entries: The skum is permanently {@condition charmed} by its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The skum can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Psychic Conditioning
entries: The skum is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition and {@condition charmed} conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: The skum takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Acidic Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks. Alternatively, it can use two slime orb attacks.

action.name: Slime Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the aboleth's next turn.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by {@spell heal} or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Enslave (3/Day)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition charmed} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

legendary.name: Slime Sphere (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The aboleth conjures a ball of acidic slime that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it.

Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and is {@condition restrained}, or half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained} on a successful one. A {@condition restrained} creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Aboleth's turns. A {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to perform a {@dc 16} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The aboleth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 19}). The aboleth can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth makes four tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by {@spell heal} or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Enslave (3/Day)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition charmed} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the aboleth is thrown up to 60 feet and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the aboleth uses multiattack, it can use its Fling in place of one of its tentacle attacks.

legendary.name: Enslave
entries: The aboleth uses its Enslave feature.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The aboleth casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aarakocra is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Fury of Syranita
entries: As a bonus action, the aarakocra can expend a spell slot to cause its melee or ranged weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning or thunder damage to a target on a hit. This beneft lasts until the end of the turn. If the aarakora expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 6d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The aarakocra has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes two melee attacks: one with its javelin and one with its talon, or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The aarakocra doesn't provoke an {@action opportunity attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes three melee attacks: one with its javelin and two with its talons, or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
